name: final cave
description:
final cave

You are in a cave and must gather so much stone as you can before the fishmans finds you. Good luck

How to play

To break down wall and gather stone, just walk into wall. To pick up torches, just walk into them as well. You will need light to be able to navigate and flee from fishmans so torches is good both in your hands and on the floor but as soon as you pick one up you can not drop it again. The torches will consumes while in your hand ( and there is a cap on how much "torch" you can have)

Controls
  • Move: W,A,S,D,Up-arrow,Left-arrow,Down-arrow,Right-arrow
  • Tap walls: Hold: 'M' (will not automatic take all required turns to break down wall and advance)
